descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=#93c47d][size=5]Background[/size][/color][/u][/b]
Olivila,daughter of an elf and a dragon,who was abondoned by her parents because of the war in Tamriel.She strayed about for a century,and now she came to skyrim for the hope of peace

[u][color=#93c47d][size=5][b]Basic information[/b][/size][/color][/u]
Location:Sleeping giant-riverwood
Body:CBBE HDT
Voice:Young nord eager
Weight:100
Marriage:Yes
Combat style:Two handed master
Spell:Dragon blood damage、fireball、Healing
Perk:Light foot,ghost extra damage,necromage

[u][color=#93c47d][size=5][b]Recommended[/b][/size][/color][/u]
HDT Physics Extensions http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?
Face Light http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]Please feel free to upload videos and pics,I'm v8ing 4 8 !Enjoy 8!!~~[/b][/size][/color]
author: romanstein
